   19: %%
   20: -module(eprof_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   25: -export([tiny/1,eed/1,basic/1,basic_option/1]).
   26: 
   27: suite() ->
   28:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   29:      {timetrap,{seconds,60}}].
   30: 
   31: all() -> 
   32:     [basic, basic_option, tiny, eed].
   33: 
   34: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   35: 
   36:     %% load eprof_test and change directory
   37: 
   38:     {ok, OldCurDir} = file:get_cwd(),
   39:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   40:     Privdir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   41:     {ok,eprof_test} = compile:file(filename:join(Datadir, "eprof_test"),
   42: 					       [trace,{outdir, Privdir}]),
   43:     ok = file:set_cwd(Privdir),
   44:     code:purge(eprof_test),
   45:     {module,eprof_test} = code:load_file(eprof_test),
   46: 
   47:     %% rootset profiling
   48: 
   49:     ensure_eprof_stopped(),
   50:     profiling = eprof:profile([self()]),
   51:     {error, already_profiling} = eprof:profile([self()]),
   52:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   53:     profiling_already_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   54:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self(),self(),self()]),
   55:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   56: 
   57:     %% with patterns
   58: 
   59:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self()], {?MODULE, '_', '_'}),
   60:     {error, already_profiling} = eprof:start_profiling([self()], {?MODULE, '_', '_'}),
   61:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   62:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self()], {?MODULE, start_stop, '_'}),
   63:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   64:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self()], {?MODULE, start_stop, 1}),
   65:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   66: 
   67:     %% with fun
   68: 
   69:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end),
   70:     profiling = eprof:profile([self()]),
   71:     {error, already_profiling} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end),
   72:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   73:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end),
   74:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end),
   75:     Pid     = whereis(eprof),
   76:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(erlang:processes() -- [Pid], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end),
   77:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end, {eprof_test, '_', '_'}),
   78:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end, {eprof_test, go, '_'}),
   79:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end, {eprof_test, go, 1}),
   80:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end, {eprof_test, dec, 1}),
   81: 
   82:     %% error case
   83: 
   84:     A         = spawn(fun() -> receive _ -> ok end end),
   85:     profiling = eprof:profile([A]),
   86:     true      = exit(A, kill_it),
   87:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
   88:     {error,_} = eprof:profile(fun() -> a = id(b) end),
   89: 
   90:     %% with mfa
   91: 
   92:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], eprof_test, go, [10]),
   93:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], eprof_test, go, [10], {eprof_test, dec, 1}),
   94: 
   95:     %% dump
   96: 
   97:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile([], fun() -> eprof_test:go(10) end, {eprof_test, '_', '_'}),
   98:     [{_, Mfas}] = eprof:dump(),
   99:     Dec_mfa = {eprof_test, dec, 1},
  100:     Go_mfa  = {eprof_test, go,  1},
  101:     {value, {Go_mfa,  { 1, _Time1}}} = lists:keysearch(Go_mfa,  1, Mfas),
  102:     {value, {Dec_mfa, {11, _Time2}}} = lists:keysearch(Dec_mfa, 1, Mfas),
  103: 
  104:     %% change current working directory
  105: 
  106:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldCurDir),
  107:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  108:     ok.
  109: 
  110: basic_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  111: 
  112:     %% load eprof_test and change directory
  113: 
  114:     {ok, OldCurDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  115:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  116:     Privdir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  117:     {ok,eprof_test} = compile:file(filename:join(Datadir, "eprof_test"),
  118: 					       [trace,{outdir, Privdir}]),
  119:     ok = file:set_cwd(Privdir),
  120:     code:purge(eprof_test),
  121:     {module,eprof_test} = code:load_file(eprof_test),
  122: 
  123:     % vanilla
  124:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:do(10) end, [{set_on_spawn, true}]),
  125: 
  126:     Mfas1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,Mfas},Out) -> Mfas ++ Out end, [], eprof:dump()),
  127:     assert_unique_mfas(Mfas1),
  128: 
  129:     {value, {_, {11, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test,dec,1},  1, Mfas1),
  130:     {value, {_, { 1, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test, go,1},  1, Mfas1),
  131:     {value, {_, { 9, _}}} = lists:keysearch({lists, split_2,5},  1, Mfas1),
  132:     {value, {_, { 4, _}}} = lists:keysearch({lists, seq_loop,3}, 1, Mfas1),
  133: 
  134:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:do(10) end, [set_on_spawn]),
  135: 
  136:     Mfas2 = lists:foldl(fun({_,Mfas},Out) -> Mfas ++ Out end, [], eprof:dump()),
  137:     assert_unique_mfas(Mfas2),
  138: 
  139:     {value, {_, {11, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test,dec,1},  1, Mfas2),
  140:     {value, {_, { 1, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test, go,1},  1, Mfas2),
  141:     {value, {_, { 9, _}}} = lists:keysearch({lists, split_2,5},  1, Mfas2),
  142:     {value, {_, { 4, _}}} = lists:keysearch({lists, seq_loop,3}, 1, Mfas2),
  143: 
  144:     % disable trace set_on_spawn
  145:     {ok, _} = eprof:profile(fun() -> eprof_test:do(10) end, []),
  146:     [{_, Mfas3}] = eprof:dump(),
  147: 
  148:     assert_unique_mfas(Mfas3),
  149: 
  150:     {value, {_, {11, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test,dec,1}, 1, Mfas3),
  151:     {value, {_, { 1, _}}} = lists:keysearch({eprof_test, go,1}, 1, Mfas3),
  152:     false = lists:keysearch({lists, split_2,5},  1, Mfas3),
  153:     false = lists:keysearch({lists, seq_loop,3}, 1, Mfas3),
  154: 
  155:     %% change current working directory
  156:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldCurDir),
  157:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  158:     ok.
  159: 
  160: assert_unique_mfas(MFAs) ->
  161:     Duplicates = lists:sort(MFAs) -- lists:usort(MFAs),
  162:     case Duplicates of
  163:         [{{erlang,apply,2},_}] -> ok;
  164:         [] -> ok
  165:     end.
  166: 
  167: tiny(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  168:     ensure_eprof_stopped(),
  169:     {ok, OldCurDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  170:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  171:     Privdir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  172:     % (Trace)Compile to priv_dir and make sure the correct version is loaded.
  173:     {ok,eprof_suite_test} = compile:file(filename:join(Datadir,
  174: 							     "eprof_suite_test"),
  175: 					       [trace,{outdir, Privdir}]),
  176:     ok = file:set_cwd(Privdir),
  177:     code:purge(eprof_suite_test),
  178:     {module,eprof_suite_test} = code:load_file(eprof_suite_test),
  179:     {ok,_Pid} = eprof:start(),
  180:     nothing_to_analyze = eprof:analyze(),
  181:     nothing_to_analyze = eprof:analyze(total),
  182:     eprof:profile([], eprof_suite_test, test, [Config]),
  183:     ok = eprof:analyze(),
  184:     ok = eprof:analyze(total),
  185:     ok = eprof:log("eprof_SUITE_logfile"),
  186:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  187:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldCurDir),
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: eed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     ensure_eprof_stopped(),
  192:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  193:     Privdir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  194:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 5}),
  195: 
  196:     %% (Trace)Compile to priv_dir and make sure the correct version is loaded.
  197:     code:purge(eed),
  198:     {ok,eed} = c:c(filename:join(Datadir, "eed"), [trace,{outdir,Privdir}]),
  199:     {ok,_Pid} = eprof:start(),
  200:     Script = filename:join(Datadir, "ed.script"),
  201:     ok = file:set_cwd(Datadir),
  202:     {T1,_} = statistics(runtime),
  203:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  204:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  205:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  206:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  207:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  208:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  209:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  210:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  211:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  212:     ok = eed:file(Script),
  213:     {T2,_} = statistics(runtime),
  214:     {ok,ok} = eprof:profile([], eed, file, [Script]),
  215:     {T3,_} = statistics(runtime),
  216:     profiling_already_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
  217:     ok = eprof:analyze(),
  218:     ok = eprof:analyze(total),
  219:     ok = eprof:log("eprof_SUITE_logfile"),
  220:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  221:     try
  222: 	S = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p times slower",
  223: 					[10*(T3-T2)/(T2-T1)])),
  224: 	{comment,S}
  225:     catch
  226: 	error:badarith ->
  227: 	    {comment,"No time elapsed. Bad clock? Fast computer?"}
  228:     end.
  229: 
  230: ensure_eprof_stopped() ->
  231:     Pid = whereis(eprof),
  232:     case whereis(eprof) of
  233: 	undefined ->
  234: 	    ok;
  235: 	Pid ->
  236: 	    stopped=eprof:stop()
  237:     end.
  238: 
  239: id(I) -> I.
